verses.verse: <S%H7442>"Shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> O <S%H6135>barren<s%> <S%H6135>one,<s%> you who have <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> [child;] <S%H6476>Break<s%> <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>joyful<s%> <S%H7440>shouting<s%> and <S%H6670>cry<s%> <S%H6670>aloud,<s%> you who have not <S%H9123>travailed;<s%> For the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> one [will be] <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H7227>numerous<s%> <S%H4480>Than<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H1166>married<s%> woman," <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H7337>"Enlarge<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of your <S%H168>tent;<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> out the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of your <S%H4908>dwellings,<s%> <S%H2820>spare<s%> not; <S%H748>Lengthen<s%> your <S%H4340>cords,<s%> And <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3489>pegs.<s%>

"For you will <S%H6555>spread<s%> <S%H6555>abroad<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> and to the <S%H8040>left.<s%> And your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> will <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And they will <S%H3427>resettle<s%> the <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H5892>cities.<s%>

<S%H3372>"Fear<s%> not, for you will not be <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame;<s%> <S%H408>Neither<s%> <S%H3637>feel<s%> <S%H3637>humiliated,<s%> for you will not be <S%H2659>disgraced;<s%> But you will <S%H7911>forget<s%> the <S%H1322>shame<s%> of your <S%H5934>youth,<s%> And the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of your <S%H491>widowhood<s%> you will <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>

"For your <S%H1166>husband<s%> is your <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> Whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts;<s%> And your <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Who is <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7121>called<s%> you, Like a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H6087>grieved<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> Even like a <S%H802>wife<s%> of [one's] <S%H5271>youth<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> she is <S%H3988>rejected,<s%>" <S%H559>Says<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
"For a <S%H9512>brief<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%> I <S%H5800>forsook<s%> you, But with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7356>compassion<s%> I will <S%H6908>gather<s%> you.

"In an <S%H7858>outburst<s%> of <S%H7110>anger<s%> I <S%H5641>hid<s%> My <S%H6440>face<s%> from you for a <S%H7281>moment;<s%> But with <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> I will <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on you," <S%H559>Says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer.<s%>

"For <S%H384>this<s%> is like the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> to Me; <S%H834>When<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%> Should not <S%H5674>flood<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5750>again,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> that I will not be <S%H7107>angry<s%> with you, <S%H4480>Nor<s%> will I <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> you.

"For the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> may be <S%H4185>removed<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> may <S%H4131>shake,<s%> But My <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will not be <S%H4185>removed<s%> from you, And My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> will not be <S%H4131>shaken,<s%>" <S%H559>Says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H7355>has<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on you.

"O <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> <S%H6041>one,<s%> storm-tossed, and not <S%H5162>comforted,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7257>set<s%> your <S%H68>stones<s%> in <S%H6320>antimony,<s%> And your <S%H3245>foundations<s%> I will <S%H3245>lay<s%> in <S%H5601>sapphires.<s%>

"Moreover, I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H8121>battlements<s%> of <S%H3539>rubies,<s%> And your <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H688>crystal,<s%> And your <S%H3605>entire<s%> <S%H1366>wall<s%> of <S%H2656>precious<s%> <S%H68>stones.<s%>
"And <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will be <S%H3928>taught<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> And the well-being of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will be <S%H7227>great.<s%>

"In <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> you will be <S%H3559>established;<s%> You will be <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H6233>oppression,<s%> for you will not <S%H3372>fear;<s%> And from <S%H4288>terror,<s%> for it will not <S%H7126>come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> you.
<S%H2005>"If<s%> anyone <S%H9075>fiercely<s%> <S%H9075>assails<s%> [you] it will not be from Me. <S%H4310>Whoever<s%> <S%H9075>assails<s%> you will <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of you.

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H595>Myself<s%> have <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H2796>smith<s%> who <S%H5301>blows<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> of <S%H6352>coals,<s%> And <S%H3318>brings<s%> out a <S%H3627>weapon<s%> for its <S%H4639>work;<s%> And I have <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> to <S%H2254>ruin.<s%>

<S%H3605>"No<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> that is <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you shall <S%H6743>prosper;<s%> And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that <S%H6965>accuses<s%> you in <S%H4941>judgment<s%> you will <S%H7561>condemn.<s%> <S%H384>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>heritage<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And their <S%H6666>vindication<s%> is from Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
